title: FPS Drop (Patch 6.23 problem or what?)
body:
Hi, I'm experiencing unusual FPS Drop during this patch, but I can't understand if it's a 6.23 problem or what. I formatted my PC because I had a lot of problems with, then I installed LOL. I've already installed all Drivers, already tried to lower the quality (I usually play with Medium/High sets), already tried to disable all sounds in game or everything suggested by Riot Support, but nothing has changed. I never had problems like that, can somebody help me? When I play my FPS are 80-50 out of combat and drop at 10-15 when I fight. I can't even play ARAM (my fav modality) coz of this problem. Any suggestions?
-
My pc:
Windows 10
Intel Core i3 - 1,80 GHz
Ram 4 GB
Nvidia GeForce GT 720m - 2 GB
(I don't think it's a pc problem because I always played good with M/H settings before now and my FPS were always 150 out of combat and 80-100 in fight).
P.S. I have also tried to close programs like Google Chrome and Spotify, the only one open is TeamSpeak, but even without I can't fix my problem.

replies.body:
Hmm.. I'd like you to hop back into your in-game VIDEO settings and enabled Vertical Sync and cap your frames to 60 FPS. Next, [perform a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure there aren't any background programs exacerbating this issue.

Let me know if you observed any changes as a result of these steps.

This is a massive problem not just an isolated incident. You need to get people notified and working on a solution please. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/eEOXRQxG-extreme-fps-drop-after-patch-622

100% agreed.  I'm running Gtx 1060, i7, 16gb ram, have zero issues with all my other games including this one prior to patch 6.23, but since that patch, I've been stuck at 38 fps at ALL settings when I use to be well above 150 or 200.  It's a bit frustrating as the choppiness is noticeable.

My pc:
Windows 7
Intel Core i7
Ram 16 GB
GTX 970

I am having the same FPS issues since patch 6.23. When any fight breaks out around Krugs or mid lane out my game drops to 5-10 fps, yet if the same fight breaks out near the center of bot lane the game runs fine. Playing the game at high settings or low settings does not change this issue. 

I would guess this is a league specific issues as games like BF1 and Paragon run excellent with no crashes or issues. I am hoping this is fixed as I would rather play LoL. 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
People been experiencing FPS issues on this patch only? I've been struggling with this problem for 5 months now!

Well your computer, quite obviously, isn't the best. But I doubt a direct or immediate upgrade is really an option for you, although if it is I would suggest getting an entirely new computer, as every piece of hardware you have is outdated. Otherwise, if that's not an option at the moment, I'd suggest first off, lowering all the quality settings to the lowest, and then also lowering the resolution of the game, and/or playing in windowed mode. I'd suggest looking any of that up on Google if you need to figure out how to do it, should be relatively simple.

Oh yeah, and Riot has a page for FPS drops, so if what I said doesn't work or you just feel like checking this first, here ya go:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting

Riot's guide doesn't work, I've tried most of those, I even factory reset my laptop.

I've already updated my graphics drivers but I had to roll-back to a previous build since I've noticed that it runs much worse!
even lowering the graphics, turning off the music, v-sync off, DVR disabled it has NO effect, It doesn't make any sense, because my laptop USED to run League of Legends consistently (My laptop has similar specs as the OP)
